short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically display the destination URL of shortened links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL Expander is a powerful Chrome extension designed to unveil the true destination behind shortened URLs. Whether you're dealing with bit.ly, t.co, tinyurl, or any other URL shortener, this extension ensures you know exactly where a link will take you before you click. Perfect for security-conscious users and anyone who wants to avoid phishing attempts, URL Expander automatically expands shortened URLs in real-time, displaying the full address right on your screen. Stay safe and informed with URL Expander!
